title: In-Class Exercise 1: Now You See It!
text:
In this hands-on exercise, two R packages will be used:

tidyverse
haven

The code chunk used is as follows:

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, haven)

title: In-Class Exercise 1: Now You See It!
text:
In this hands-on exercise, two R packages will be used:

tidyverse
haven

The code chunk used is as follows:

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, haven)

title: In-Class Exercise 1: Now You See It!
text:
Importing PISA Data
The code chunk below uses read_sas() function of haven to import PISA data into the R environment.
#| eval: false was used to prevent the code chunk from running.

stu_qqq <- read_sas("Data/cy08msp_stu_qqq.sas7bdat")

The code chunk below uses the filter() function of dplyr to retrieve records from Singapore (SGP) only.

stu_qqq_SG <- stu_qqq %>% 
  filter(CNT == "SGP")

The code chunks below uses write_rds() and read_rds() to save and read the records from Singapore in R format.

write_rds(stu_qqq_SG, 
          "Data/stu_qqq_SG.rds")


stu_qqq_SG <- read_rds("data/stu_qqq_SG.rds")
